official_title: A bill to control processing by certain foreign vessels operating in the internal waters of Alaska during 1981.

summary.text: Prohibits any foreign vessel from engaging in processing or fishing support activities in Alaskan internal waters during 1981 unless: (1) the Governor of Alaska determines the extent to which U.S. fish processors will not have or will not utilize adequate processing capacity in specified Alaskan internal waters and determines the duration of such lack of or non-utilization of capacity; and (2) the Secretary of Commerce concurs with the Governor's determination and authorizes the transfer of fish to foreign vessels in Alaskan internal waters. Sets forth penalties for violations of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to control processing by certain foreign vessels operating in the internal waters of Alaska during 1981.
